name: Lights Out (itch) (Healfish-Games)
description:
It's late at night, and you're alone at home.

Your mom gives you a call to remind you to go to sleep soon.

Looks like you'll have to brave the dark in order to get some shut-eye...

Explore your house in the middle of the night, solving puzzles, and attempting to go to bed.

When you turn on or off the lights, the environment changes around you. Talk to strange beings, solve quizzes, or explore bizarre mazes as you attempt to get a good night's rest.

And, of course, you can't forget that monster under your bed...

This game is a sequel to "The Very Short Game With The Incredibly Scary Monster", although you do not need to play that game to enjoy this one.
